scripts.test: rm -rf ../*.tgz && rm -rf ../.next && npm run build && npm pack --pack-destination ../ && cd ../ && npm uninstall @sydsoft/base && npm install *.tgz && npm run dev
scripts.copyFiles: find . -name "*.css" -not -path "./dist/*" -exec sh -c 'for f do mkdir -p "./dist/esm/$(dirname "$f")"; cp "$f" "./dist/esm/$f"; done' sh {} +
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copyFiles
scripts.publishNPM: npm run build && npm version patch && npm version minor && npm publish --dry-run && npm publish --access public && npm run clean
